title: Secure Multi-Factor Authentication and Access Control
summary: Implement secure, compliant, and user-friendly multi-factor authentication for customer access.
description: Develop a secure authentication module that leverages multi-factor authentication to verify users with combinations of passwords, OTPs, and optional biometric credentials. The system must enforce bank-grade encryption for stored and transmitted data, employ session timeouts, and support adaptive authentication based on device recognition or location. This will ensure both security and convenience while meeting regulatory compliance requirements.

title: Responsive Interface and Personalized User Dashboard
summary: Create a responsive, unified interface with a personalized dashboard showing user-specific services and insights.
description: Design and implement a fully responsive user experience that adapts seamlessly across desktops, tablets, and mobile devices. The dashboard should dynamically reflect account details, eligible financial products, and personalized recommendations based on customer profiles. Ensure UI accessibility, consistency, and adherence to modern design principles while maintaining performance and responsive behavior under variable network conditions.

title: Core Banking System Integration and Independent Database Setup
summary: Establish secure integration with core banking systems and implement an independent performance-optimized database layer.
description: Develop a robust integration framework using secured APIs and message queues to enable synchronous and asynchronous data exchange with the existing core banking system. Configure a dedicated portal database for caching, request management, and analytics to improve portal responsiveness while preserving system integrity. Implement synchronization protocols, data recovery mechanisms, and consistent data validation across connected environments.

title: Digital Account Opening and Service Request Workflows
summary: Develop user-driven digital workflows for account opening and service modifications.
description: Create interactive and guided onboarding workflows allowing customers to open new accounts and submit service change requests with minimal steps. The workflow must include auto-save functionality, data pre-filling for returning users, input validation, eligibility checks, and real-time verification against core banking records. Ensure an intuitive layout and transparent submission process to enhance the self-service experience.

title: Document Upload and Digital File Management
summary: Provide a secure and compliant document upload mechanism for required banking documentation.
description: Implement a digital documentation system that allows customers to upload necessary proofs or forms directly through the portal as part of their workflow. Provide file validations for size, format, and authenticity. Encrypt all files both in transit and in storage, associate documents with respective applications, and enable customers to track, replace, or download approved documents securely within set retention periods.

title: Real-Time Status Tracking and Automated Notifications
summary: Enable real-time request tracking and automated multichannel notifications.
description: Develop a status-tracking engine that presents up-to-the-minute updates on ongoing applications and service requests. Integrate with an event-driven notification system to deliver timely alerts via email or SMS when actions such as approvals, rejections, or additional document requests occur. Include customization for frequency and communication preferences while maintaining security and privacy of customer data.

title: User Activity History and Audit Reporting
summary: Track user activity history and maintain auditable records of all transactions and actions.
description: Build a secure logging infrastructure to record user actions, submitted requests, document uploads, and communication interactions. Provide customers with a ‘My Activity’ view summarizing all past transactions and request outcomes. Implement comprehensive backend audit reporting for administrative oversight and compliance auditing, ensuring all logs remain immutable and retrievable for regulatory inspection when required.

title: Role-Based Access Control and Privilege Management
summary: Implement dynamic role-based access controls to restrict and authorize functionality per user type.
description: Develop a flexible role-based access control (RBAC) framework managing permissions for customers, employees, and administrators. Establish granular access rules defining which functions and data are visible and modifiable based on user profiles, account types, or authorization levels. The system should seamlessly integrate with authentication modules and allow future scalability for new roles or features.

title: Data Security, Privacy, and Compliance Governance
summary: Implement strong encryption, privacy policies, and compliance mechanisms to protect customer data.
description: Develop and maintain robust data protection protocols consistent with financial compliance standards such as PCI DSS, GDPR, and regional banking laws. Include encryption key management, intrusion detection, vulnerability assessments, and automated compliance monitoring. Implement security dashboards for administrators and define audit-ready documentation and response plans to ensure continuous protection of sensitive information.
